item.title: State of RAD 2019
item.description: Though we are often sold into the idea that software development is better than ever before, the measure of better is open for debate. Surely you now have fancy stuff/words like DevOps, CI/CD, TDD, BDD, and more acronyms than there are three letter agencies in the US government. But, for those old enough, there was a time when you could build stuff with just a notepad. It “got the job done”.
